00087 // This complex macro creates the structs needed to support a new stream
00088 #define NEW_STREAM(X) \
00089   struct  X ## buffer : public buffer_base \
00090   { \
00091     X ## buffer() : buffer_base() {}; \
00092     virtual void print(const char* const s) \
00093     { \
00094       mi_ ## X("%s",s); \
00095     }; \
00096   }; \
00097   \
00098   struct  X ## stream : public ostream \
00099   { \
00100     X ## stream() : ostream( new X ## buffer ) \
00101     { \
00102       flags( std::ios::showpoint | std::ios::right | std::ios::fixed ); \
00103     }; \
00104     ~ X ## stream() { delete rdbuf(); }; \
00105   }; \
00106   \
00107   extern MR_LIB_EXPORT X ## stream *  X
00108
